function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing standardized surveillance protocols and regular testing","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting formal quantitative synthesis studies to evaluate the impact of changes in work arrangements and worker education","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict infection control measures, comprehensive ppe policies, and regular testing for healthcare workers.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardize ppe guidelines, provide adequate training on proper use, and enforce universal masking policies.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure availability of n95 respirators in healthcare settings, and implement proper fit testing and training for healthcare workers","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide guidelines for proper use of cloth masks and ensure availability of medical masks for high-risk settings","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement specialized entrance floor systems and antimicrobial surface coatings","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Include recommendations for natural light exposure and window size to mitigate virus propagation","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement thorough moisture management and humidity control strategies based on expected standards","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Providing resources for stress management, mental health support, and training on managing remote work","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Staggered break times, restricted number of people in work areas, adjusted work sites for physical distancing","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforce strict physical distancing measures and rotate work schedules to reduce the number of workers on-site","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase project timelines to allow for proper safety measures and sanitation, and provide support for employee well-being","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide support for employee well-being, encourage flexible work arrangements, and promote a healthy work environment","category":"Support
